title: 幫手report 藍絲 TG group

replies.msg:
大家一齊 report 到佢收皮！
https://t.me/yeeseelostandfound

Draft 好投訴內容

Dear Telegram Team,

The protest in Hong Long has created great divide among the city. I notice that this group is posting random youngsters and framing them to be involved with the violent acts that occurred over the past days.

However, it must be pointed out that over 2 Million People was united in black and marched on the streets peacefully for 3 times over the past month, ones t-shirt color and age, does not automatically imply that the person was involved in any criminal activity.

This group, and it's purpose is solely to cyberbully people of different political views. I believe it should not be tolerated in telegram.

Please consider disbanding this group according to telegram’s user policy.

Thank you
